nodes.text: The Arjan II logic computer was a verbobrain that was created to be a direct competitor to the AAA-2 VerboBrain, made popular by the 3PO-series protocol droids. The computer was found primarily as the central processor of the Roche Hive Mechanical Apparatus Design and Construction Activity for Those Who Need the Hive's Machines J9 worker drone. Due to the droid's staggering unpopularity, the Arjan II never had the market share to keep up with its competitor.
